verses.text: 選出七位執事門徒不斷增加的時候，講希臘話的猶太人，埋怨本地的希伯來人，因為在日常的供給上，忽略了他們的寡婦。

words.note: Lit. 'one who manages affairs'.
Lit. 'door follower', implying a student of a master.
Lit. 'not stopping'.
Indicates aspect or scope, e.g., 'in terms of supply'.

verses.text: 於是十二使徒召集了眾門徒，說：「要我們放下　神的道，去管理伙食，是不合適的。

words.note: Lit. 'sent disciple'.
The preceding space indicates reverence in some Bibles.
Often refers to God's word or truth.
Originally referred to food for a group of people.

verses.text: 所以弟兄們，應當從你們中間選出七個有好見證、滿有聖靈和智慧的人，我們就派他們負責這事。

words.note: Often used for fellow believers.
Lit. 'holy spirit'.

verses.text: 至於我們，我們要專心祈禱、傳道。」

words.note: V-O compound, lit. 'offer prayer'.
V-O compound, lit. 'spread the word'.

verses.text: 這個意見全會眾都很滿意，於是選出司提反，他是一位滿有信心和聖靈的人，還有腓利、伯羅哥羅、尼加挪、提門、巴米拿，以及歸信猶太教的安提阿人尼哥拉，

words.note: Lit. 'full intention' or 'full mind'.
Lit. 'return to faith'.
Lit. 'Jewish religion'.

verses.text: 叫他們站在使徒面前。使徒禱告後，就為他們按手。

words.note: Lit. 'sent follower'
Verb-object compound, 'to make a prayer'
A ritual act for blessing, healing, or consecration.

verses.text: 神的道傳開了；在耶路撒冷，門徒人數大大增加，有很多祭司也信從了真道。

words.note: Refers to God's message or truth.

verses.text: 司提反被捕司提反滿有恩惠能力，在民間施行大奇事和神蹟。

words.note: Indicates a passive action. This phrase is likely a section heading.
Repetition suggests '司提反被捕' might be a header for the verse.
Often paired with 神蹟 to denote supernatural acts.

verses.text: 當時有幾個稱為「自由人」會堂的人，就是從古利奈和亞歷山太來的人，另外還有基利家人和亞西亞人，他們出面與司提反辯論，

words.note: Refers to members of the Synagogue of the Freedmen.
People from Cilicia.
People from the Roman province of Asia.

verses.text: 但司提反靠著聖靈和智慧說話，他們就抵擋不住。
於是他們唆使眾人，說：「我們聽過他說謗瀆摩西和　神的話。」

words.note: A formal term for blasphemy or sacrilege.
Refers to the God, often elevated with a space for reverence.

verses.text: 又煽動民眾、長老、經學家，這些人就來捉拿他，把他帶到公議會，

words.note: Refers to Jewish scholars who interpreted the Law.
Indicates the object is being 'disposed of' by the verb.
The supreme judicial and administrative council of the Jews.

verses.text: 並且造了假的證供說：「這人不斷抨擊聖地和律法。

words.note: Refers to the Jerusalem temple or the city of Jerusalem.

verses.text: 我們聽他說過：『這拿撒勒人耶穌要毀壞這地方，改變摩西傳給我們的規例。』」

words.note: A person from Nazareth; often used as a title for Jesus.

verses.text: 當時，坐在公議會裡的人，都注視他，見他的面貌像天使一樣。

words.note: The supreme Jewish council.
